Table.sql: SELECT d.ma,d.ten,sum(1) as c01,sum(to_number(decode(a.phai,0,1,0))) as c02,sum(to_number(decode(a.phai,1,1,0))) as c03 FROM his.btdbn a,his.benhandt b,hismmyy.pttt c,his.bctheopttt d WHERE a.mabn=b.mabn and b.maql=c.maql and b.LOAIBA=1 and c.mapt=d.ma

SELECT d.ma,d.ten,sum(1) as c01,sum(to_number(decode(a.phai,0,1,0))) as c02,sum(to_number(decode(a.phai,1,1,0))) as c03 FROM his.btdbn a,his.benhanngtr b,hismmyy.pttt c,his.bctheopttt d WHERE a.mabn=b.mabn and b.maql=c.maql and c.mapt=d.ma

SELECT d.ma,d.ten,sum(1) as c01,sum(to_number(decode(a.phai,0,1,0))) as c02,sum(to_number(decode(a.phai,1,1,0))) as c03 FROM his.btdbn a,hismmyy.benhanpk b,hismmyy.pttt c,his.bctheopttt d WHERE a.mabn=b.mabn and b.maql=c.maql and c.mapt=d.ma

SELECT d.ma,d.ten,sum(1) as c01,sum(to_number(decode(a.phai,0,1,0))) as c02,sum(to_number(decode(a.phai,1,1,0))) as c03 FROM his.btdbn a,hismmyy.benhancc b,hismmyy.pttt c,his.bctheopttt d WHERE a.mabn=b.mabn and b.maql=c.maql and c.mapt=d.ma
